column1: Little Goat Diner////We started with the noodle wrapped shrimp which was delish - big juicy shrimp and great
column2: crunchy texture from the noodles. I had the korean burger with kimchee
column4: and the flavors were amazing. My only complaint is that it practically fell apart when I picked it up and the bun was rather soggy towards the end
column5: but it was tasty regardless. My husband had the pork belly pancake - he said it was good but not super memorable. He also ordered a side of the mac and cheese which he devoured.
